title: New Post 纯充数
content:
doc/docx转pdf的小脚本

from win32com import client

import sys
import os

import loguru

logger = loguru.logger
logger = logger.opt(colors=True)

try:
    word_client = client.Dispatch("Word.Application")

    docx_name = sys.argv[1]
    pdf_name = docx_name.split('.')[0] + '.pdf'

    docx_path = os.path.abspath(docx_name)
    pdf_path = os.path.abspath(pdf_name)

    document = word_client.Documents.Open(docx_path)
    document.SaveAs(pdf_path, 17)
    document.Close()

    word_client.Quit()
    logger.success(f"转换成功")
except IndexError:
    logger.error("未指定文件")
except Exception as err:
    logger.critical(str(err))
